text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar What the fuck are you doing right this minute to solve this Covid-19 problem you helped to exacerbate (means made worse)? More than 54,000 Americans are dead in less than 4 months, and YOU are busy tweeting about the media. How did this fuck become president? God Save Us!
